name: Washington's Wig (itch)
description:
In this completely historically inaccurate tale, George Washington has embarked on his famous crossing of the Delaware only to realize he has forgotten his precious wig. Join a cast of canines as they bravely race to return the missing hairpiece. Old-school arcade action meets adorable dogs (except the ugly ones) in this fast-paced canine adventure.

Washington's Wig is the winning game from IGN's The Next Game Boss, a videogame development reality show produced for the IGN/YouTube START network. Washington's Wig was originally completed in February 2012 during a series of challenges on The Next Game Boss. Washington's Wig was later released on XBLIG for the XBox 360, Google Play, and iOS.

GAMEPLAY
Washington's Wig contains 3 gameplay modes: endless run, story, and race. Use space to jump or double jump. Hold down space to slow down when on ice. Grab speed tokens to go faster.  Grab invincible tokens to become impervious to enemy attacks for a short period.  Jump up to soar with the eagle or land on the sturgeon's back to catch a ride.  

CONTROLS
space/tap/click: JUMP and DOUBLE JUMP
hold down space/tap and hold/click and hold: SLOW DOWN when on ice
